attributes.review: I wanted to check out this app to support my lord and savior trump, but to my surprise this app has nothing to do with trump. I don’t know if this is a joke but all I see when I open the app is and orange!!!🍊🍊🍊how can fruits even have an app!😡
attributes.title: Horrible!!!

attributes.userName: me sad when i look at trump
attributes.review: Seeing trump made me pick up a knife and kill my family. now I am dead. Yes I’m dead but that’s ok if I don’t have to look at the orange agian then I will die agian and agian. So don’t download this app it will make u kill ur family!!!
attributes.title: This app made me kill my family and me!!! (True story)

attributes.review: i was ~p r o m i s e d~ that if i downloaded this Adam Driver would come to my house 😔 it’s been 4 weeks and still nothing i’m so heart broken 😫😫 i used the app like twice and all it did was make me??? more orange ??? like by day 3 of using it i looked 🍊🍊🍊🍊 OUTRAGEOUS anyways Harry Styles 2020
attributes.title: oopsies

attributes.review: SOOOO many bugs, everytime i got into the app my phone would restart or crash. I couldn’t log in to learn more about what Trump is planning to do. The whole app was very frustrating so I just deleted it.

OH MY GOD THIS WAS HORRUBLE. i am not part of the tiktok trend BUT LET ME JUST SAY 🧚‍♂️worst💋app🥰ever🌺 my phone crashed only when this app was on my phone and it gave my phone a bug. I just wanted to see the plans of our current president and al of his ideas were horrible. I do not recommend
attributes.title: GIANT SHLONG

attributes.review: Trump said he would give me a pornstar if I download this app I didn’t revive the pornstar and better yet I didn’t GET TO GRAB HER BY THE 🙀 I’m outraged that this man would do this to me so I’m going to leave a 1 Star unless he gives me the star that’s all I want
attributes.title: Riley reed did not show up

attributes.review: why would you EVER use that vulgar language? and those photos are absolutely disgusting. there should be a warning for children or something, what is wrong with the developers of this app??

attributes.review:

attributes.review: This app actually was so difficult to work and so hard to actually get and information about and the first thing when i opened the app i cried because i saw this huge disgusting racist homophobic old orange man and puked. all over.

attributes.review: Just a horrible app. There is no way anyone should download this in any way possible. I don’t even think trump supporters should download this app. What a disgusting, ugly, and terrible app. There is nothing that will change my opinion. THIS APP IS GARBAGE
